Header.title: Ape Go Ape
Header.paragraph: Welcome to GoApe NFT's on the Solana Blockhain. 800 apes doing what apes do! Roaming around the Solana ecosystem. Fighting to be the next King of NFT'S

Features.title: Who are we?
Features.text: We created Go Ape to build the strongest community on the blockchain. Anyone who owns an Ape has to promise, that no matter what... YOU APE INTO EVERYTHING YOUR FELLOW APES APE INTO!!!

Features.title: What is our mint price?
Features.text: Even though we are offering a limited 800 apes we are not doing this for the money. We want our Apes to be here for the right purpose, to build an outsandting community which is why our mint price is 1 sol.

Features.title: wen launch
Features.text: We are targetting a launch before OCt 20th. Please stay up to date with our discord announcements to make sure you do not miss out.

Features.title: Whatâ€™s next
Features.text: That will be up to our community, we want them to feel included in what our next step is. Of course we are not aiming to be a nft game, this is just a fun deflationary art that we have worked hard to create. We are hoping to build a great community of solana apes who love to ape.
